title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.175 - Indirect liability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.175 - Indirect liability

State Regulations
(a) An
obligation not yet incurred but for which responsibility may have to be assumed
in the future; as, the possible liability from the premature settlement of a
long-term contract. (b) A debt of
another, as the result of which an obligation to pay may develop; a contingent
liability. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.175

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
